languages.text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Старый офицер поднимает густые брови в непритворном изумлении — и облегчении.{/n} "Не знаю, за какие мои заслуги вы столь снисходительны к старику... но я не буду перечить приказу Вольного Торговца — тем более что даже желания такого не имею! Ох, только бы вот успеть вам нового сенешаля на смену себе воспитать..."

"Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Старый офицер поднимает густые брови в непритворном изумлении — и облегчении.{/n} "Не знаю, за какие мои заслуги вы столь снисходительны к старику... но я не буду перечить приказу Вольного Торговца — тем более что даже желания такого не имею! Ох, только бы вот успеть вам нового сенешаля на смену себе воспитать..."

Oh, I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

Oh, I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

Oh, I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

"Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! Oh, I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}El viejo oficial enarca sus pobladas cejas con una genuina expresión de asombro... y alivio.{/n} «Ignoro qué servicio ha prestado este anciano para merecer tal indulgencia... pero no contravendré una orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, ¡en especial cuando no albergo ningún deseo de hacerlo! Si tan solo tuviese tiempo para adiestrar a un nuevo senescal que me sustituya...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}El viejo oficial enarca sus pobladas cejas con una genuina expresión de asombro... y alivio.{/n} «Ignoro qué servicio ha prestado este anciano para merecer tal indulgencia... pero no contravendré una orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, ¡en especial cuando no albergo ningún deseo de hacerlo! Ah, si tan solo tuviese tiempo para adiestrar a un nuevo senescal que me sustituya...».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}老齢の士官は豊かな眉を上げて、まごうことなき驚きと安堵の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「老いぼれに対してそのような寛容さを得るほど、私がどのような奉仕をしたのかはわかりませんが…自由開拓者の命令には逆らえませんし、元より逆らう意思もありません！ ああ、私の代わりを務める新たな家令長を教育する時間だけでも欲しかった…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}老齢の士官は豊かな眉を上げて、まごうことなき驚きと安堵の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「老いぼれに対してそのような寛容さを得るほど、私がどのような奉仕をしたのかはわかりませんが…自由開拓者の命令には逆らえませんし、元より逆らう意思もありません！ ああ、私の代わりを務める新たな家令長を教育する時間だけでも欲しかった…」
「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}老齢の士官は豊かな眉を上げて、まごうことなき驚きと安堵の表情を浮かべた。{/n}「老いぼれに対してそのような寛容さを得るほど、私がどのような奉仕をしたのかはわかりませんが…自由開拓者の命令には逆らえませんし、元より逆らう意思もありません！ ああ、私の代わりを務める新たな家令長を教育する時間だけでも欲しかった…」

languages.text: “舰长大人……”{n}这位老军官扬起他浓密的眉毛，毫不掩饰他的惊讶与欣慰之情。{/n}“我不知道我做了什么事，才有幸让您对我这把老骨头如此宽容……但我不会违抗行商浪人的命令，更何况我也不愿这么做！我真希望能有足够的时间，培养一位新的总领接我的班……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……”{n}这位老军官扬起他浓密的眉毛，毫不掩饰他的惊讶与欣慰之情。{/n}“我不知道我做了什么事，才有幸让您对我这把老骨头如此宽容……但我不会违抗行商浪人的命令，更何况我也不愿这么做！噢，我真希望能有足够的时间，培养一位新的总领接我的班……”
“舰长大人……”{n}这位老军官扬起他浓密的眉毛，毫不掩饰他的惊讶与欣慰之情。{/n}“我不知道我做了什么事，才有幸让您对我这把老骨头如此宽容……但我不会违抗行商浪人的命令，更何况我也不愿这么做！噢，我真希望能有足够的时间，培养一位新的总领接我的班……”

languages.text: {n}Le vieil officier hausse ses sourcils broussailleux en signe de surprise et de soulagement sincères.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... J'ignore quel service j'ai pu rendre pour mériter une telle indulgence... mais le vieil homme que je suis n'a aucune intention de discuter les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! J'aimerais seulement avoir le temps de former un nouveau sénéchal pour me remplacer... »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil officier hausse ses sourcils broussailleux en signe de surprise et de soulagement sincères.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... J'ignore quel service j'ai pu rendre pour mériter une telle indulgence... mais le vieil homme que je suis n'a aucune intention de discuter les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! J'aimerais seulement avoir le temps de former un nouveau sénéchal pour me remplacer... »

languages.text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Der alte Offizier hebt aufrichtig überrascht und auch erleichtert seine buschigen Brauen.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, welchen Dienst ich vollbracht habe, um einen solchen Großmut einem alten Mann gegenüber zu rechtfertigen ... doch ich werde mich dem Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht widersetzen. Zumal ich das gar nicht möchte! Ich wünschte nur, mir bliebe die Zeit, einen neuen Truchsess als Ersatz auszubilden ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

Zumal ich das gar nicht möchte! "Ach, ich wünschte nur, mir bliebe die Zeit, einen neuen Truchsess als Ersatz auszubilden ..."

"Lord Captain ..." {n}Der alte Offizier hebt aufrichtig überrascht und auch erleichtert seine buschigen Brauen.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, welchen Dienst ich vollbracht habe, um einen solchen Großmut einem alten Mann gegenüber zu rechtfertigen ... doch ich werde mich dem Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht widersetzen. Zumal ich das gar nicht möchte! Ach, ich wünschte nur, mir bliebe die Zeit, einen neuen Truchsess als Ersatz auszubilden ..."

languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! Oh, I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Yaşlı subayın kalın kaşları, şaşkınlık ve rahatlama duygularını barizce yansıtıyor.{/n} "İhtiyar bir adam olan ben, böylesi bir anlayışı hak etmek için ne yaptığımı bilemiyorum... Fakat Hür Tacir'in emrine karşı gelecek değilim, zaten gelmek gibi bir niyetim de yok! Keşke yerime geçecek bir Seneşal yetiştirmeye vaktim olsaydı..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The old officer raises his bushy brows in unfeigned astonishment — and relief.{/n} "I know not what service I have rendered to warrant such indulgence toward an old man... but I shan't defy the Rogue Trader's order, particularly since I have no desire to do so! I just wish I had time to train up a new Seneschal to replace me..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Yaşlı subayın kalın kaşları, şaşkınlık ve rahatlama duygularını barizce yansıtıyor.{/n} "İhtiyar bir adam olan ben, böylesi bir anlayışı hak etmek için ne yaptığımı bilemiyorum... Fakat Hür Tacir'in emrine karşı gelecek değilim, zaten gelmek gibi bir niyetim de yok! Keşke yerime geçecek bir Seneşal yetiştirmeye vaktim olsaydı..."
